column2: Now you have reached adulthood, it is time to choose your class. From fighter to wizard, there is a class for everyone, and it will steer your course into your older years.
I want to be an aristocrat
I want to be a bard
I want to be a cleric
I want to be a druid
I want to be a fighter
I want to be a monk
I want to be a paladin
I want to be a ranger
I want to be a rogue
I want to be a sorcerer
I want to be a wizard

In your time of suffering, your thoughts turn to the Crying God, the One Who Endures, Ilmater. A vision of a burly man, dressed only in a breechcloth, bearing marks of horrible mutilation and martyrdom, yet he smiles compassionately.
I embrace Ilmater in my time of need
